Audioform’s 'RITUAL' Bass Event Is Back With Its Second Edition This Friday

Posted by Brittany Prevost on April 14, 2022

TICKETS

Ottawa is gearing up for one of the most epic party weekends to date! Tomorrow, Friday, April 15, 2022, in addition to CLOSER at City At Night, bass lovers will flock to RITUAL at The 27 Club.

We had the opportunity to attend the RITUAL debut last month. In case you missed it, you can check out our event recap here. We can honestly say this was one of the most fun events in town - so, you won't want to miss it!

The monthly bass-centric event series is back with its second edition. Get ready for new artists, but the same stellar production Audioform is acclaimed for. The RITUAL is calling, so be sure to get your tickets before it sells out here.

Attendees can count on special performances by the likes of KORFUS, Filthy, MHOLY, OWLZ, STOLLI, and a soon-to-be memorable back to back with DAV BOA and VANPAGE. The local talent is off the charts; be sure to give them a follow!

To get you hyped for this event, we encourage you to check out STOLLI's incredible melodic dubstep mix below. Lastly, don't forget, Flag fam: RITUAL will be happening monthly, so be sure to check it out sometime - you won't be disappointed!

STOLLIMUSIC · Melodic Dubstep Set

 

Written By Brittany Prevost
